attributes.action: MPs re-convene and sit in the House of Commons before children go back to school
attributes.additional_details: Children and their families are not test cases. Parents and teachers need to see strong leadership to invoke confidence that schools re-opening is the correct and safe thing to do
attributes.background: Lead by example and sit in the House of Commons before sending any children back to school

rejection.details: Since you started this petition some schools have reopened and the House of Commons is meeting in Westminster.
